text:
Hello Smarty boi ya Sharma ji ke launde, dono hi appropriate hai. Yaad hai mujhe jab mai HR interview dekhkar aaya, bhai kya pucha kya jawab diye, Teri woh shakal mai nahi bhulne wala mai, probably the only instance jab maine tujhe tension mai dekha. 
Intern se chalu hui dosti ab toh kaafi aage bhad chuki hai aur hopefully jaldi hi flatmates bhi ban jayenge. Aage bhi aise hi mentors and managers ke charche jaari rahenge pakka.
Ek accha sa camera phone kharidke meri setting karwana teri zimedari hai. 
Bas ab toh sirf Bangalore jaake tere saath bakchodiyan karne ka intezar hai. Till then take care.
author: Rohin  Gupta

text: Mera first year wala woh roommate jiske saath maine bacche hue 3 saal mai jyada yaadein banai. From trying to getting rid of each other to not willing to hang up even after hours, we came a long way. Lambi lambi trip plan karwani ho ya fir campus se bhagke kahin jana ho, my go to man for everything. Yeh memoir me jitna likhun tumhare baare mai, utna kam hai mere dost. Itni hi asha hai ki yeh kissa yahan khatam nahi balki yahi se chalu ho raha ho. Best of Luck in all your endeavours man.
author: Rohin  Gupta

text: Hello Foreigner Friend. Doctor Sahab apne appointments future mai bhi dete rehna.
author: Rohin  Gupta

text: Hello Sharma ji, you are one of the most pure-hearted and comical persons I have seen at IITK. Mujhe woh scene hamesha yaad rahega jab tum Senator baane ke liye mere room mai vote mangne aaye the. Senator banke fruit vendor ko ban karwa diya na tune ya woh kaam abhi bhi baccha hai. Orientation ke time tumhara SG role play bhi kaafi bhadiya tha. Intern toh offline nahi ho pai warna tumhe aur acche se jaan pata. Hopefully Bangalore jaldi hi jaana hoga and wahan fir saath mai khub saari bakchodiyan pelenge. Tab tak ke liye phone se hi kaam chala lenge. Company join karne ke baad change mat ho jana and aise hi sabka dil halka karte rehna hamesha. Take care, milte hai jald hi.
author: Rohin  Gupta

text: Bhai Maisam, koi jugad hai kya teri? Tu toh poore campus ko jaanta hai, kuch karwa yaar. One of the most Mast persons I met at IITK jo apna room Cards khelne ke liye hamesha available karwa deta tha :) . Jindagi mai mujhe Ladakh ghumne ek baar toh jaana hi hai pakka, tab please mera tour guide ban jana xD.
author: Rohin  Gupta

text: Events Ground chal raha hai kya bro? Events Ground ka toh pata nahi par Goa jaroor gaye saath mai. Thanks for your constant companionship throughout these past years and hopefully for many more years to come.
author: Rohin  Gupta

text:
Jain bhai, please Naveen aur Barot ko samjha yaar :) . Jain please jaldi se sabko ikhata kar der ho rahi hai. As I sit writing this memoir after countless reminders, I realise ki mai sirf complaint karne aata tha tere pass. Asha karta hun kabhi bahut jyada irritate nahi kiya hoga. JEE mai same marks laane se leke from getting our interns within a day of each other, bas itni hi similarities dikhti hai mujhe. 
Jokes aside, You have always been a fun and helpful person. Never Change and All the Best for your future.
author: Rohin  Gupta

text:
Hello Dhawal, Orientation mai bacchon ki bitching karne mai bahut mazza aaya. Jo silsila orientation mai chalu hua tha woh bacchon ne rukne nahi diya till the time we were in campus.
You seem like a nice person and unfortunately I couldnâ€™t get to know you better. Hopefully aage dobara chance milega kabhi. 
Till then, Ciao
author: Rohin  Gupta

text: Tum woh pehle bande the jisko mai jaanta tha ki yeh EE join kar raha IITK mai mere saath. Unfortunately, kabhi jyada interaction ho hi nahi paya. Par jitna bhi hua, har baar mazza aaya tumse baat karke. Asha hai ki kabhi aage mauka milega aur tum bhi mere liye Jaydeep se JD ban jaoge :) Till then, Take Care
author: Rohin  Gupta

text: Bhai mujhe khelna nahi aata hai, seekha dena kaise khelte hai aur carry bhi kar dena. Thanks for playing CS and Valorant with me and hamesha aise hi Khush rehna.
author: Rohin  Gupta

text: Hello mere chappu friend, from asking ki tujhe mai yaad hun ya nahi to becoming 2nd year roommates kaafi progress ho gayi apni. Umeed hai aap bhi Mota bhai jaise hi full taraaki karein apne jindagi mai and haan apni arranged marriage mai jaroor se bulana.
author: Rohin  Gupta

text:
Hey Nitish, you are one of the most hardworking and helpful people I have seen and met at IITK. I consider myself fortunate that I came to know you and could discuss Electrical Engineering courses with you, that really helped me a lot in these last four years. I feel that you are one of the few Electrical Engineers from our batch that had genuine interest in the subject and research. EE370, EE381, EE320, Vipul Sir ke Music Projects kya kya nahi discuss kiya tumhare saath. It was always fun and insightful interacting with you.
Same wing, Y18 orientation, extended CS family, Room 234 and much more, we had many things in common apart from studies. I believe that our bond grew with time as all good things should. Hopefully, our paths will cross sometime again in the future. Till then, Keep in touch. All the Best for your future.
author: Rohin  Gupta

text: Hello Piyush, hum dono ek doosre ko utna acche se toh nahi jaan paye kyunki internship ghar se hi ho gayi hamari :( , par phone mai jitni baar bhi baat hui tumse baat karke accha laga. PPO milne ki news bhi tumne pehle dedi thi, aage bhi aisi hi bhadiya khabrein dete rehna. Asha hai ki jaldi se Bangalore jaane mille aur tumse lambi lambi baatein kar paye.
author: Rohin  Gupta

text: Hey Reithick, you are the only person that made me speak English at IITK. One of the most tension-free and intelligent persons I met at IITK, it was nice to know you. Thanks for always sorting out my subject related doubts. Take Care.
author: Rohin  Gupta

text: Hello Lab Partner. Labs ko sambhalne mai and fraud banwane ke liye bahut bahut thanks.
author: Rohin  Gupta

text: Excellent Class Notes writer. TA201A mai tumne project kaise banwaya mujhe aaj tak samajh nahi aaya. EE381A ki lab mai fraud marne mai saath dene ke liye thanks. Kaafi intern interviews bhi saath mai baithke diye. You were one of the most genuine and intelligent persons I met at IITK. Never Change and Keep in Touch.
author: Rohin  Gupta

text: Kanpur se Kolkata aur Kolkata se Kanpur and beech mai bahut saare mutual friends.
author: Rohin  Gupta

text:
Hello Bhai Shailabh, Shashank yaad rahega ya nahi pata nahi par Shailabh jaroor yaad rahega. Orientation mai pehli baar baat hui tumse but fir uske baad baton ka silsila ruka nahi. ESC201 ki lab mai bakchodiyon se lekar intern ke dukhon tak sabme tumne saath diya. 
Thanks for everything. Aage bhi cool boy banke aise hi chapte rehna aur yaad zaroor se rakhna. Hopefully, jaldi hi dobara milenge.
author: Rohin  Gupta

text: Nainital ki trip ko memorable banane ke liye thanks. Us trip pe jahan bhi gaye saath gaye, tumhare bina trip survive karna wouldn't have been possible. Hamesha aise hi khush rehna. Take Care.
author: Rohin  Gupta

text: Bhai yeh sabse itne asaani se dosti kaise kar lete ho, mujhe bhi sikhao apne yeh skills. Tumse utni baar baat nahi hui hogi, jitna corridor aur canteen mai Hello kiye honge ek doosre ko xD. Financial Economics mai pass karwane ke liye dhanyawad. Aage bhi milke ek doosre ko Hello karte rehna hai. Itne apna dhyaan rakhna. Ciao.
author: Rohin  Gupta

text: Patte khelne aa raha hai kya? Haan bhai chalo par sirf 2 round khelunga aur fir 2 ghante ke baad bhi uthne ka naam nahi lete the. Kaafi mazza aaya tumhare saath yeh 4 saal. Aage bhi aise hi chapte rehna apne jindagi mai. Wing Reunion karwane ke responsibilty tumhari xD. Take care and yaad jaroor rakhna.
author: Rohin  Gupta
